HOME REMEDIES: 1. Apply apple cider vinegar:Mix 1 part apple cider vinegar and 3 parts water (use more water for sensitive skin).
2.Make a honey and cinnamon mask:Mix 2 tablespoons of honey and 1 teaspoon of cinnamon to form a paste.
3.Spot treat with tea tree oil-Mix 1 part tea tree oil with 9 parts water.
Dip a cotton swab into the mixture and apply it to the affected areas.
Repeat this process 1–2 times per day, as needed.
